replies.author: skyliye
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 skyliye 于 2019-6-27 23:45 编辑 

神秘时代6详见：https://www.mcmod.cn/class/956.html，上面也有各个附属mod的下载链
神秘时代6的前置MOD:
饰品栏 (Baubles)
依赖神秘时代6的MOD:
Thaumic CalculationsPlanar Artifice神秘之日本刀 (Thaumic Katana)Thaumic JEI神秘库存扫描 (Thaumcraft Inventory Scanning)奥法置换 (Thaumic Equivalence)神秘领域 (Thaumcraft Addition)注魔酿造 (Infusion Brewing)神秘基础学 (Thaumic Bases)神秘能源 (Thaumic Energistics)神秘工匠 (Thaumic Tinkerer)
与神秘时代6联动的MOD:
邪恶工艺 (EvilCraft)集成动力/动态联合 (Integrated Dynamics)拔刀剑日系附属包 (SlashBlade Japanese Addon Pack)瑞士军刀 (SwissArmyKnife)魔法匠魂 (Pewter)盆栽 (Bonsai Trees)恐怖生物 (Lycanites Mobs)冰与火之歌 (Ice and Fire)热力膨胀5 (Thermal Expansion 5)把未来带回现实 (Et Futurum)
神秘时代4详见：https://www.mcmod.cn/class/204.html

神秘时代4的前置MOD:
饰品栏 (Baubles)
依赖神秘时代4的MOD:
西风太刀 (Blade of the Zephyr)神秘炼金学 (Thaumic Alchemy)中土神秘学 (Middle-Earth Thaumaturgy)独角兽权杖 (ExtraScepterStaff)更多要素 (More Aspects/Polybius)神秘库存扫描 (Thaumcraft Inventory Scanning)神秘扭曲学 (Warp Theory)无限神秘标签页 (Not Enough Thaumcraft Tabs)奥能矿物 (Thaum Ores)液体嬗变 (Transmute Liquids)节点力学 (Nodal Mechanics)神秘膨胀 (Thaumic Expansion)神秘装饰 (Thaumic Upholstry)奥法置换 (Thaumic Equivalence)奥法献祭学 (Arcane Arteries)自然魔法 (Magia Naturalis)黑暗神秘学 (Thaumic Darkness)巫媒 (Shamanry)神秘力学 (Thaumic Machina)混合魔法 (Mixed Magic)高等神秘学 (Advanced Thaumaturgy 2)神秘奥义 (Thaumaturgical Knowledge)神秘领域 (Thaumcraft Addition)魔法饼干 (Magic Cookies)注魔酿造 (Infusion Brewing)魔像秘经 (Gadomancy)神秘染料 (Thaumic Dyes)奥法工程学 (Arcane Engineering)源质神秘学 (Essential Thaumaturgy)巫师宝具 (Witching Gadgets)神秘基础学 (Thaumic Bases)神秘视界 (Thaumic Horizons)污秽魔法 (Tainted Magic)自动化魔法 (Automagy)神秘节点追踪 (Thaumcraft Node Tracker)神秘能源 (Thaumic Energistics)神秘合成 (Thaumcraft Recipes)神秘门 (ThaumcraftGates)神秘管道 (Thaumic Pipes)对称度运算仪 (Symcalc)神秘探险 (Thaumic Exploration)神秘注魔 (Thaumic Infusion)禁忌魔法 (Forbidden Magic)电力魔法工具 (Electro-Magic Tools)神秘工匠 (Thaumic Tinkerer)魔法蜜蜂 (Magic Bees)
与神秘时代4联动的MOD:
铁路 (Railcraft)邪恶工艺 (EvilCraft)曲率驱动 (WarpDrive)格雷科技5 (GregTech5)旅行者装备栏 (Traveller's Gear)旅者之器 (Traveller's Gear)更多金属板 (More Plates)魔法金属 (ManaMetalMod)心血结晶 (The Heartwork)扩展装备 (Expanded Armory)敌对生物和女孩们 (Hostile Mobs and Girls)恐怖生物 (Lycanites Mobs)星辉生万物·重生 (Ex Astris Rebirth)时间和空间的相对维度 (TARDIS MOD)极乐世界 (The Elysium)SpmodAPI源质魔法4非官方版 (EssentialCraft 4 Unofficial)时之沙 (Clockwork Phase)更多首饰 (Baubles Stuff)Gany的世界 (Gany's Surface)Another One Bites the Dust豆腐工厂重置版 (Tofu Factory Reloaded)量子魔法 (Technomancy)更好的储存 (Better Storage)农业工艺 (AgriCraft)无尽贪婪 (Avaritia)额外植物学 (ExtraBotany)源质魔法3 (EssentialCraft 3)缤纷纪元 (ChromatiCraft)ModTweaker匠魂扩展 (Extra TiC)星辉生万物 (Ex Astris)更多头颅 (Headcrumbs)魔法作物 (Magical Crops)储物抽屉 (Storage Drawers)拔刀剑 (Slash Blade)FSP蒸汽动力 (Flaxbeard's Steam Power)热力膨胀4 (Thermal Expansion 4)海洋物语 (Mariculture)Ex Aliquo植物魔法 (Botania)气动工艺 (PneumaticCraft)金属工坊 (Foundry)血魔法 (Blood Magic)等级存储 (LevelStorage)匠魂 (Tinkers' Construct)旋转工艺 (RotaryCraft)等价交换3 (Equivalent Exchange 3)格雷科技6 (GregTech6)尼格洛兹·无尽曈曚 (NegoreRouse)潘马斯农场 (Pam's HarvestCraft)可生长矿石 (B0bGary's Growable Ores)另一个通用Bug修复 (Another Common Bug Fix)
